full_address: 1730 Currumbin Creek Road, Currumbin Valley, Qld 4223
description:
This large manicured private estate boasts its own botanical Garden with a fully restored original Homestead together with secondary house plus bungalow on seven titles. The main residence has been tastefully restored with a modern kitchen (granite Benchtops) Tasmanian Maple cabinetry, marble bathroom and three bedrooms plus In-Ground pool. With large covered outdoor entertainment areas together with surround sound system providing a wonderful opportunity for intimate get-togethers. The botanical Gardens are extensive with many hundreds of imported rare and endangered species plus a substantial natural subtropical rainforest, the property also boasts a private waterfall with its own entertaining area. Two Party Barns “chandeliers” rustic bar used for memorable family functions or special occasions. This is complimented with large machinery sheds, first grade infrastructure all set in a Beautiful botanical environment. With an extensive road frontage and your own private mountain (one thousand foot high cliffs) offering total privacy with famous Gold Coast beaches only 20 min away. The bonus being its only 25 minutes from Coolangatta airport …..this property offers it all in Spades.

You no longer need to dream about what it is like to live in your own pristine Feng Shui National Park – experience it firsthand with this exceptional Currumbin Valley landholding that sprawls across almost 194 acres. Covering seven titles and accessed by a palm tree-lined entry, it's a natural wonderland. Better yet, with three separate residences onsite, you can share this enchanting lifestyle with loved ones and create a peaceful and private family compound.

The main house embodies classic charm and boasts three bedrooms, a marble bathroom with spa, country-style kitchen and a spacious and sunny living and dining zone. Access the wide, covered verandah from here to soak up the serenity or entertain guests, with a pool on hand outdoors for hot summer days. A secondary home features a granite kitchen, cosy living area with fireplace, two bedrooms and one bathroom, with a covered outdoor entertaining area and private garden to enjoy. Additionally, a cabin with a kitchenette, bedroom, bathroom, and verandah awaits, ensuring there is no shortage of living space on this expansive acreage. Rustic country barns add to the character of this former banana plantation with multiple machinery sheds onsite. Water is abundant too, the land encompasses several large paddocks ready to accommodate cattle and sheep.

Truly a unique property prospect, this tranquil, triple-dwelling estate promises so much potential. Located close to Currumbin Valley Primary, just 20 minutes to the beach. Don't let this peaceful paradise and one-of-a-kind opportunity pass you by - arrange your inspection today.

Combined Features:
- Lush and leafy 194 acres with seven titles (very rare)
- Your own National Park, with waterfall, swim hole and scenic picnic area
- Large Botanical Gardens
- Several paddocks, perfect for cattle and sheep
- Water throughout the property for animals
- 3 bores
- Complete Privacy
- Palm tree-lined entrance
- First grade infrastructure
- Original Rustic country barn
- 25 minutes to Gold Coast Airport

- Traditional home enriched with classic charm
- Country-style kitchen with ample storage, granite benches, ILVE oven and gas cooktop, microwave and dishwasher

- 3 sunny bedrooms: 1 with walk-in robe, 2 with built-in robes
- Master marble bathroom with spa, large shower, and vanity with ample storage
- Covered verandah, ideal for entertaining or enjoying lush garden views
- Inground pool
- External office and outdoor bathroom with shower, toilet, and laundry
- Linen cupboard
- Enviro cycle
- Large concrete water tank
- Multiple sheds
- Creek
- Electric hot water

1706 Currumbin Creek Road Features (House)
- Country-style kitchen with granite tops, oven and microwave, gas cooktop
- Open plan living zone with fireplace
- Two bedrooms with built-in robes
- Travertine & Marble Bathroom with bath, shower, toilet, and vanity with extra storage
- Covered outdoor entertaining area
- Private garden
- Laundry
- Verandah
- Creek


1706 Currumbin Creek Road Features (Cabin)
- Kitchenette and open plan living and bedroom area
- Bathroom with laundry, shower, and toilet
- Verandah
- Gas hot water

Location
Approx. 7 mins to Currumbin Valley Primary School
Approx. 25 mins to large shopping precinct
Approx. 20 mins to Currumbin Alley
Approx. 25 mins to Gold Coast Airport
Approx. 31 mins to Burleigh Heads
